The previews also give you most of the basic information like title, name of the pornstar, rating, date uploaded, and HD tag. But they don’t include the damn video length anywhere. Shame on you. Though I doubt anything could shame a site that specializes in piss porn.

Stunning 4k Videos Reveal Every Sopping Wet Detail

Videos play with very minimal buffering. And there are no ads or any of that kind of bullshit here. That’s mostly kept to a couple of banners on the front page and a “deals” page under “Members Extras.” You can toggle the video quality up to 4k on some of the videos, but 1080p on most others.

Free Access to Other Network Sites and Member Exclusive Site Discounts

The other options under “Member Extras” are kind of cool. I already talked about the “Discounts/Deals” page. But there’s a section for viewing bonus videos. Shit that didn’t make the cut for full videos, or blooper scenes from established videos. There’s a live cams site that’s linked for pissing cam girls, and an ad there for a VR piss porn site if that’s your thing. Finally, there’s a button for “Go Interactive” that takes you off-site to a choose your own adventure type porn site.

Tons of Organization Options Make Finding the Best Piss Video Simple

Watch Every Video A Model Has Across Every Network Site All on One Page

data.title: PervertChat

data.detailedDescription:
Pervert Chat has the kind of tour page that’s become a pet peeve of mine in this industry. There’s almost nothing to be seen out front besides spaces to type your email address and password, the fields functioning like a virtual bouncer keeping the riffraff out. Anybody can get in, sure, but the setup offers a somewhat frustrating air of mystique. The masked woman with the jugs is enticing, but I wonder how many potential users leave before they find out what’s really inside. The whole thing turned out to be much kinkier than I’d expected, and I say that as a seriously jaded internet pervert. (Spoiler alert: it’s scat.)

The site opened a few years ago, and given the name, I think they initially had a tighter focus than they do now. Pervert.Chat is not just a place for dirty talk, but a content sales platform as well. You’ve got other choices out there on the market, as my reviews and rankings here at MissAVDH can attest, but this ain’t your typical ripoff of OnlyFans, CooMeet or Chaturbate. If you’re such a deeply kinky and fetishistic pervert that you have a hard time finding willing models, this might be just the joint you were looking for.

You’ll Never Guess What These Girls Are Doing

There’s a great range of sexy, oft-kinky models hawking their wares, GFEs and other experiences. I selected the Female option from the dropdown menu of genders, and was treated to page after page of MILFs, ebony goddesses, sweet little chubsters, cosplay cuties, goth chicks, dominatrixes and pornstar-looking bimbos. The gender filter was a little clunky, and often seemed to revert to the all-inclusive spread after flipping a page, but it wasn’t too big of a deal. I was more annoyed that you can’t open profiles in new tabs, and you’re shuffled all the way back to page one whenever you’re done looking at one.

The thing is, I’d probably tell you the same thing about the roster on any decent webcam site or chat platform out there. One of the things that really makes Pervert.Chat stand out is that they don’t have the same restrictions on content as most of the other adult websites out there. Because of this, they have attracted some specific demographics of deep-niche kinksters.

Yes, my poop-loving friends, Pervert Chat is full of scat and other legal “forbidden” fetishes. It’s a delicate and risky dance, but it looks like these guys are in good standing with their payment processors, so you can use VISA and MasterCard just like you would on any vanilla paysite. There’s always a chance of banking issues on their end with such taboos, but if anything happens, they’re also accepting crypto.

Not the Typical Rules, Not the Typical Sport

I got curious just what was allowed and what wasn’t, since their rules are obviously so different from what we’re used to elsewhere. They ban illegal and exploitative stuff, obviously, and you’ve got to use the word “step” if you’re doing family roleplay, just like anywhere else. Race play, age play, drugs and kidnapping are prohibited, but scat, pee, puke, boob milk and blood are allowed. That last one supposedly only applies to menstruation, but I saw a pretty red and poopy butthole a few minutes ago. Hypnosis, asphyxiation and fisting are all good.

Pervert.Chat could benefit from some category tagging, which would make it easier to find the models who are dabbling in the kind of weird shit you’re into. Literal weird shit isn’t my usual masturbatory fare, but I had trouble finding other kinks. There’s a search bar, but it only flicks through usernames. I typed “scat” into the box and found models with names like Philscat, Emilyscat, and Cassiescat. Allyscat looks like a really cute, really normal-ass MILF who you’d never expect gets down with the doo doo, but she’s got a whole lot of photos and videos for sale on top of her paid chats.

Free Galleries and Premium Fetish Content

I clicked on a redhaired hottie named xxxtaylornicole and found a nice selection of free pics. In some, she’s in a pool or bathtub. In others, she’s looking sexy in bed. Some shots feature dildos, and those same shots typically feature turds, too. There’s a very messy triple dildo blowjob video clip for free, but the rest of her movies will cost you at least a few bucks.

Pervert Chat models can set their own prices like they can on any decent content platform, and as you can imagine, the prices are all over the place. Xxxtaylornicole honestly has some of the better prices I’ve seen for videos on the site, with $50 puke scenes on the higher end of her scale. Given the deep-niche nature of the material here, those price tags shouldn’t come as a huge surprise to the fetishists in the audience.

I feel like they could move more units by implementing some tagging. Sometimes it’s unclear exactly what you’re paying for from the title alone. I spent four bucks on a photo called So Close, sight unseen. It feels a little bit like winning the lottery to land on a good one, but I’m a lucky guy: the photo is a closeup of a babe’s twat getting stuffed full of her boyfriend’s cock.

And You Can Chat, Too, Pervert

One really noteworthy and strange omission to the interface is a filter to show who’s been active most recently. Only a few of the models on the first page of the lineup have been active within the last 24 hours. Flipping through the pages, I see a ton of women who haven’t been active for days, weeks, or even months, along with the occasional hottie who was doing stuff just minutes ago. Any kind of chat site thrives on active users, while abandoned profiles amount to clutter, getting in the way of the good times to be had.

I really wonder if Pervert.Chat initially set out to become a go-to spot for custom scat porn and dirty talk about literally the sexiest shit. The whole platform is built to enable chatting with the adult models of your choice and efficiently deliver all kinds of photo and video content, which can and does work for basically any adult niche out there. The restrictions here, however, are far looser and more lenient than any mainstream porn site, which has resulted in an influx of legit deviates. I think you’re going to find yourself in very good company, my filthy friends.
